comment: /**  * Wraps the caused exception in a {@link CamelExecutionException} if its not  * already such an exception.  *  * @param e the caused exception  * @return the wrapper exception  */
code: /**  * Wraps the caused exception in a {@link CamelExecutionException} if its not  * already such an exception.  *  * @param e the caused exception  * @return the wrapper exception  */ public static CamelExecutionException wrapCamelExecutionException(Exchange exchange, Throwable e) {     if (e instanceof CamelExecutionException) {         // don't double wrap         return (CamelExecutionException) e.     } else {         return new CamelExecutionException("Exception occurred during execution", exchange, e).     } }
